name: Magnifying Chime
target: one unattended object or object in your possession
text: You cause the touched object to vibrate and release sonic energy once per round as a loud, dangerous chime. The sound grows in strength as time passes. On your turn in the round after you cast the spell, the chime deals 1d6 points of sonic damage to all creatures and objects within 5 feet of the target. Each round after that, the damage increases by 1d6 and reaches 5 feet farther in all directions. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage for that round only.
target_zh: 一个无主物体 或 一个你随身携带的物体
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则减半; 见文本
text_zh: 你让被接触到的物体开始震动，并且每轮会释放出一次音波能量，它的表现形式为一声嘹亮却又危险的钟声。这股声响会随着时间的流逝而越来越强。当你施放该法术后的下一轮，进行到你的回合时，钟声会对距离目标5尺范围内的所有生物造成1d6点音波伤害。在此之后的每一轮，这个伤害都会增加1d6点，范围向所有方向延伸5尺。成功的强韧豁免仅能使那一轮造成的伤害减半。
